pli-tv-bu-vb-pc4:2.1.7: _Padaso_ does not literally mean “memorize”, but something like “by the line”. The reason I have “memorize” here is simply an artifact of  my translation of the rule just above. The expression _padaso dhammaṁ vāceyya_ literally means “causing (someone) to say the Teaching by the line”, which implies helping another to memorize the teaching, hence my rendering.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc4:2.2.4: Because the gender of the ordained person is not given, I use “them”.
